casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rama Dion Benjamin CRUMP 151PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2019 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, for Crump, Ramar Dion Benjamin James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Peter A. Regulski, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney Generals, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of June 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
